name: cotab
description: Cursor Smart Rewrites-style inline edit suggestions. OpenAI compatible API / LM Studio / Ollama support.

commands.title: Cotab: [Server] Install or update - Easily install/update llama.cpp on the system via the web.
Cotab: [Server] Uninstall - Uninstall llama.cpp installed on the system
Cotab: [Server] Start - Start the llama-server on the system
Cotab: [Server] Stop - Stop the llama-server on the system

cotab.autoTriggerOnCursorMove.description: Automatically trigger completion on cursor movement

cotab.apiBaseURL.description: OpenAI compatible Base URL (e.g. `http://localhost:8080/v1`) recommended llama-server

cotab.localServerArg.description: Arguments for launching the local server (llama.cpp)

cotab.temperature.description: Creativity (0-1, lower values recommended. if -1, server's default setting is used)

cotab.top_p.description: Top-p sampling (if -1, server's default setting is used)

cotab.top_k.description: Top-k sampling (if -1, server's default setting is used)

cotab.maxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens for LLM output

cotab.maxOutputLines.description: Maximum number of output lines from LLM

cotab.commentLanguage.description: Comment language. If empty, uses editor language (e.g. 'English', 'Japanese', 'Chinese', 'Fran√ßais')

cotab.overrideSystemPrompt.markdownDescription: Completely replaces the default system prompt

cotab.additionalSystemPrompt.markdownDescription: Additional prompt to add to the default system prompt

cotab.overrideUserPrompt.markdownDescription: Completely replaces the default user prompt

cotab.additionalUserPrompt.markdownDescription: Additional prompt to add to the default user prompt

cotab.overrideAssistantThinkPrompt.markdownDescription: Completely replaces the default assistant thinking prompt

cotab.additionalAssistantThinkPrompt.markdownDescription: Additional prompt to add to the default assistant thinking prompt

cotab.overrideAssistantOutputPrompt.markdownDescription: Completely replaces the default assistant output prompt

cotab.additionalAssistantOutputPrompt.markdownDescription: Additional prompt to add to the default assistant output prompt

cotab.startEditingHereSymbol.description: Symbol string indicating the start of editing

cotab.stopEditingHereSymbol.description: Symbol string indicating the end of editing

cotab.completeHereSymbol.description: Symbol string inserted during code completion

cotab.aroundBeforeLines.description:
Number of lines to retrieve before cursor position (LLM inference target range)
 Recommended: 0 
(Setting to 0 makes LLM output start from cursor line, stabilizing LLM output)

cotab.aroundAfterLines.description: Number of lines to retrieve after cursor position (edit target range)

cotab.aroundMergeAfterLines.description:
End line of surrounding code used during merge (edit target range)
Recommended: cotab.aroundAfterLines + LLM output lines (~10) + about 5 lines

cotab.aroundCacheBeforeLines.description:
Start line of surrounding code for cache utilization.
If cursor position doesn't exceed this line, source code in User Prompt won't be updated, enabling effective Prompt Cache usage.

cotab.aroundCacheAfterLines.description:
End line of surrounding code for cache utilization.
If cursor position doesn't exceed this line, source code in User Prompt won't be updated, enabling effective Prompt Cache usage.

cotab.maxSymbolCount.description: Maximum number of symbols to include in symbol code blocks

cotab.logLevel.description: Log output level (ERROR: errors only, WARNING: warnings and above, INFO: info and above, DEBUG: everything)
